trans-unit.source: true to indicate that the handle was opened asynchronously; otherwise, false.

\n

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

Connects to a waiting server with an infinite time-out value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx$xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The client is already connected.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n
